sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import './About.css' function About() { return (

pro-Gym


pro-Gym is a gym that is located in the heart of the city.
We have a wide range of equipment and facilities to cater to all your fitness needs.
We offer a variety of classes, including yoga, pilates, and zumba.
Our trainers are certified professionals who will help you reach your goals in no time! Come visit us today!

our-mission

A gym session or brisk walk can help. Physical activity stimulates
various brain chemicals that may leave you feeling happier, more relaxed and less anxious.
You may also feel better about your appearance and yourself when you exercise regularly,
which can boost your confidence and improve your self-esteem.

) } export default About
